thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Awful Hotel
thread.title_full: Awful Hotel - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: PermanentTraveler77
title: Awful Hotel
text: Horrible hotel. There is NOT one thing I liked about this hotel other than the location. Everything else was just BAD! The internet barely worked since they are using a third party system. Everything in this hotel seemed like it was patched up. This place needs a major rennovation. It's a pitty because it's in such a great location.
